Prev

JavaScript Frameworks

Next
Framework Website Description
JQuery jquery.com Has features for: navigating/manipulating the DOM and making AJAX requests. Has separate JQueryUI with several handy widgets Several other frameworks are based on it.
Angular[1] angular.dev[3] Currently popular framework. Uses TypeScript. Fairly heavy-weight. Focused on building single-page applications. Has it's own ecosystem of extensions[2]
React react.dev Another currently popular framework. Written in JavaScript or TypeScript. Components implemented as functions. HTML rendered using combination of JavaScript & HTML called JSX
Vue.js vuejs.org Attempt to build a simple but powerful framework that can be also be used for more complex use cases. HTML templates and v-* attributes to render HTML.
htmx htmx.org A minimalist framework that allows any element to issue HTTP requests and utilizes API endpoints that return snippets of HTML instead of JSON objects.
and a bunch more
  1. More specifically Angular 2.0+
  2. Probably true of a lot of these frameworks
  3. Apparently the URL just changed
